body_html:
(+protobuf unbundling which isnt part of this PR)

@perfinion would you mind pointing me to your changes for protobuf unbundling? I see in the build script for the gentoo package that you added protobuf to TF_SYSTEM_LIBS, but I can't find the changes to Tensorflow to observe that option.

edit

Nevermind, found it here: https://dev.gentoo.org/~perfinion/patches/tensorflow-patches-1.11.0_rc2.tar.bz2
Thank you!

Any plans to include this in master?

body:
> (+protobuf unbundling which isnt part of this PR)

@perfinion would you mind pointing me to your changes for protobuf unbundling? I see in the build script for the gentoo package that you added protobuf to TF_SYSTEM_LIBS, but I can't find the changes to Tensorflow to observe that option.

edit

Nevermind, found it here: https://dev.gentoo.org/~perfinion/patches/tensorflow-patches-1.11.0_rc2.tar.bz2
Thank you!

Any plans to include this in master?
